questions.question: Why are symbols used on maps?

Explain.
questions.answer: A map is a drawing of an area.

questions.question: Explain.
questions.answer: Symbols are signs used on maps.

questions.question: Explain.
questions.answer: A legend explains the symbols on a map.

questions.question: Explain.
questions.answer: A scale shows distance on a map.

questions.question: Explain.
questions.answer: A physical map shows natural features.

questions.question: Explain.
questions.answer: A political map shows states and countries.

questions.question: Explain.
questions.answer: A sketch is a rough drawing.

questions.question: Explain.
questions.answer: Hospitals are shown using H symbol.

questions.question: Explain.
questions.answer: Railway lines are shown by lines.

questions.question: Explain.
questions.answer: Post offices are shown using P symbol.

questions.question: Explain.
questions.answer: Schools are shown using S symbol.

questions.question: Explain.
questions.answer: Maps use colours to show features.

questions.question: Explain.
questions.answer: Maps are useful in daily life.
